simpleContextSWFFinder

public java.util.List<Multimedia> simpleContextSWFFinder(java.lang.String URL)
Simply find swf by URL-Context, getFlash-Context and swf-WhiteList. Especially for WebPages that are dominated by one swf, like http://www2.razerzone.com/Megalodon/
